name: Feather Field
desc: A magical barrier of chaff in the form of feathers appears and protects you. Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC against ranged attacks by magic weapons.
higher_level: When you cast **feather field** using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration is increased by 1 round for each slot level above 1st.
casting_time: 1 reaction, which you take when you are targeted by a ranged attack from a magic weapon but before the attack roll is made
